visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Data Trends'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include the name 'Monthly Data' and the provided data. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Data Trends'. The chart type is specified as 'spline', and the title is styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 20px. The x-axis and y-axis labels are styled with a medium gray color and a font size of 14px, while the y-axis title is styled with a medium gray color and a font size of 16px. The data series is named 'Monthly Data' and includes the provided data, with a custom color of teal (#008080). Additional configurations include a light gray background color for the chart, margins to ensure the title and labels are not cut off, and a legend that is enabled and styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 14px.
